attributes.action: Use the findings of the Chillcot hearing to bring legal proceedings against Mr Blair, Campbell and all others found guilty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 2003 Tony Blair stated that Saddam Hussain could launch weapons of mass distruction within 45 minutes.
This was found to be massively incorrect.

As of today no WMD's have been founed yet we have suffered deaths in our armed forces and many more casulties.

In addition to that many Iraqui civillians have been killed.

The shock and awe sceens shown over the world just brought shame and grief to our country and I believe those responsible should be held accountable

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
